title: Huaweiâ€™s Mate Xs 2 launches in China with Snapdragon 888 4G and stylus support
content:
Today, Huawei announced its next foldable handset, the Mate Xs 2. The design is similar to its predecessor which was launched in 2020, the Mate Xs. The Mate Xs 2 is powered by a 4G version of the Qualcomm Snapdragon 888, 8GB RAM, 256GB or 512GB of internal storage, and a 4600mAh battery. There will

The post Huawei’s Mate Xs 2 launches in China with Snapdragon 888 4G and stylus support appeared first on XDA.
description: Huawei has announced its latest foldable handset, the Huawei Mate Xs 2, powered by the Snapdragon 888 4G. Check it out here!
